name: Vega Savalas
story: Giannis Floros was born in a small village in Greece where he grew up surrounded by a large family. He joined the army after finishing high school and quickly climbed the ranks due to his leadership skills and bravery in battle. As a team leader in Arma 3, he is responsible for leading his troops in combat and ensuring their safety. He takes his job seriously and is always thinking strategically, even in the heat of the moment.
